```{r}
ebola <- st_read("./spatial_outputs/ebola.gpkg")

other <- st_read("./spatial_outputs/other_spillovers.gpkg")
```

```{r}
all_combined <- bind_rows(ebola, marburg, other, nipah_ryan_unfinished)
```

```{r}
st_write(all_combined, "./spatial_outputs/all_combined.gpkg", append = FALSE)
```
